short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Stay focused on Australian websites by hiding acknowledgements.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Increase your productivity: This Chrome extension hides full-screen dialogs as well as acknowledgement sections on Australian websites.
It also simplifies some Australian place labels with English, e.g. Ayers Rock.
With these features, it can help you to reduce distractions while browsing and to direct attention to the actual content.

Clear your mind and your web browser.
